ak256":"0x63d79066bdea45317e84c1adbda4a7346b7bec8b53884e3e603887a71d19fb65","urls":["bzzr://fe17907d41311239f89c5f3241836527c18b224d3fedc14805bc462af79f4a85"]}},"version":1}

nodes.documentation:
@title Mecenas
The main mecenas contract. Here is all the main logic to register
content creators and be able to support then via prepaid monthly
subscriptions. There is a percent fee + fixed fee per every subs
that goes to the contract owner to support development. Content
creators can withdraw their wage monthly.
nodes.name: Mecenas

nodes.documentation:
@dev Emits a new subscription message, from the mecenas to the content creator.
It can be showed in the main website or integrated into a streaming platform,
to show in live and see the content creator reaction.
    * An integration with Twitch could be possible.
nodes.name: newSubscriptionMessage

nodes.documentation: Emits a new content creator. This can be consumed in the webapp to show latest content creators.
nodes.name: newContentCreator

nodes.documentation: @dev Initialize the contract, sets an owner, a default feePercent and fixedFee.

@dev Set the badges ledger contract address
@param badgesLedgerAddress the Badges ledger deployed address
nodes.name: setBadgesLedgerContract

nodes.documentation: @dev Modifier to throw when msg.value is less than contract owner fee;
nodes.name: minimumAmount

nodes.documentation:
@dev Calculate and returns the minimum amount possible to surpass owner fees.
@return uint The minimum possible amount to surpass fees.
nodes.name: getMinimumAmount
greaterThanMinimumAmount

nodes.documentation:
@dev Set percent fee per content creator subscription.
@param newFee The new percent fee to be set
nodes.name: setPercentFee

nodes.documentation:
@dev Set fixed fee per content creator subscription.
@param newFee The new fixed fee to be set.
nodes.name: setFixedFee

nodes.documentation:
@dev Pay the fee to the contract owner. Returns the remain amount to support the content creator.
@return uint256 Returns the remaining amount after fees.
nodes.name: payFee

nodes.documentation: @dev Withdraw owner fees, only callable by owner.
nodes.name: withdrawFees

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "You will receive a Silver badge token in compensation, ocassional extra content like making-off videos or photos. And a lot of love."

arguments.value: You will receive a Silver badge token in compensation, ocassional extra content like making-off videos or photos. And a lot of love.

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "You will receive a Gold badge token in compensation, extra video content and audio commentary of new and old videos. And a lot of love."

arguments.value: You will receive a Gold badge token in compensation, extra video content and audio commentary of new and old videos. And a lot of love.

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "You will receive a Gold badge token in compensation, all of above and access to an exclusive forum, where i will reply to any question you want to ask to me. And a lot of love."

arguments.value: You will receive a Gold badge token in compensation, all of above and access to an exclusive forum, where i will reply to any question you want to ask to me. And a lot of love.

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "You will receive a Silver badge token in compensation, ocassional extra content like making-off videos or photos. And a lot of love."

arguments.value: You will receive a Silver badge token in compensation, ocassional extra content like making-off videos or photos. And a lot of love.

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "You will receive a Gold badge token in compensation, extra video content and audio commentary of new and old videos. And a lot of love."

arguments.value: You will receive a Gold badge token in compensation, extra video content and audio commentary of new and old videos. And a lot of love.

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "You will receive a Gold badge token in compensation, all of above and access to an exclusive forum, where i will reply to any question you want to ask to me. And a lot of love."

arguments.value: You will receive a Gold badge token in compensation, all of above and access to an exclusive forum, where i will reply to any question you want to ask to me. And a lot of love.

nodes.name: supportContentCreator

calculateNextWage(address).return: uint with the next content creator wage.

changeAvatar(string).details: Change the content creator avatar, only allowed by content creator itself.

params.avatarHash: The new avatar IPFS hash to be set.

changeContentCreatorAddress(address).details: Change the content creator address, only allowed by content creator itself.

params.newAddress: The new address to be set.

changeContentCreatorTiers(uint256,string.details: Change the content creator tier, by index, only allowed by content creator itself.

params.description: The new description to be set.
params.price: The new price to be set.
params.title: The new title name to be set.

changeDescription(string).details: Change the content creator description, only allowed by content creator itself.

params.description: The new description to be set.

params.ipfsAvatar: Current content creator Avatar IPFS hash

destroy().details: Transfers the current balance to the owner and terminates the contract.

getContentCreator(address).return: nickname The content creator name.description Content creator description.creationTimestamp Creation timestamppayday Next content creator payday datebalance Current content creator balanceipfsAvatar Current content creator Avatar IPFS hashtotalMecenas The number of subscriptionscontentCreatorAddress Addresswage The next wage value.

getContentCreatorByNickname(bytes32).return: nickname The content creator name.description Content creator description.creationTimestamp Creation timestamppayday Next content creator payday datebalance Current content creator balanceipfsAvatar Current content creator Avatar IPFS hashtotalMecenas The number of subscriptionscontentCreatorAddress Addresswage The next wage value.

getMinimumAmount().details: Calculate and returns the minimum amount possible to surpass owner fees.
getMinimumAmount().return: uint The minimum possible amount to surpass fees.

getTier(address,uint256).details: Get content creator tier content, by index.
getTier(address,uint256).return: title The title of the tier.description The description of the tier.price The price of the tier.

getTiersLength(address).details: Get content creator tiers length, to be able to iterate it later.

greaterThanMinimumAmount(uint256).details: Function that returns true if first argument is greater than minimum owner fee.

params.amount: Test if amount is greater than minimum amount.

monthlyWithdraw().details: Allow content creator to withdraw once the payload date is greater or equal than today. If contract is paused, this function is still reachable for content creators.

pause().details: called by the owner to pause, triggers stopped state

renounceOwnership().details: Allows the current owner to relinquish control of the contract.

setBadgesLedgerContract(address).details: Set the badges ledger contract address

setFixedFee(uint256).details: Set fixed fee per content creator subscription.

params.newFee: The new fixed fee to be set.

setPercentFee(uint256).details: Set percent fee per content creator subscription.

params.newFee: The new percent fee to be set

supportContentCreator(address,uint256,st.details: Support a determined content creator, via a prepaid monthly subscription. You can set any price, regarding the suggested price tiers, and add a support message to the content creator.

transferOwnership(address).details: Allows the current owner to transfer control of the contract to a newOwner.

params._newOwner: The address to transfer ownership to.

unpause().details: called by the owner to unpause, returns to normal state

withdrawFees().details: Withdraw owner fees, only callable by owner.

devdoc.title: Mecenas The main mecenas contract. Here is all the main logic to register content creators and be able to support then via prepaid monthly subscriptions. There is a percent fee + fixed fee per every subs that goes to the contract owner to support development. Content creators can withdraw their wage monthly.

renounceOwnership().notice: Renouncing to ownership will leave the contract without an owner. It will not be possible to call the functions with the `onlyOwner` modifier anymore.
